statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, product_name FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 3;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customer WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_description FROM Campaign WHERE DATEDIFF(campaign_end_date, campaign_start_date) > 30;
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount FROM Purchase WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Purchase WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM Customer JOIN Purchase ON Customer.customer_id = Purchase.customer_id WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_description FROM Campaign WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_end_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone, total_amount FROM Customer JOIN Purchase ON Customer.customer_id = Purchase.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT purchase_id, amount, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT offer_id, product_id, offer_discount, expiry_date FROM offers WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;

SELECT c.name, p.product_name, o.offer_discount FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id JOIN offers o ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pu.amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, pi.quantity, o.offer_name FROM products p INNER JOIN purchase_items pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id INNER JOIN offers o ON pi.purchase_id = 10 AND o.discount > 0.2;

SELECT c.customer_name, pr.product_name, pu.total_amount FROM customers c LEFT JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN products pr ON pr.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM purchase_items WHERE purchase_id = 5);

SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(*), AVG(p.total_amount) FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY AVG(p.total_amount) DESC;
